org.livingdoc.repositories.rest

Class RESTRepository

  • org.livingdoc.repositories.rest.RESTRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentRepository

    public class RESTRepository
implements DocumentRepository

    This implementation of a DocumentRepository uses a remote HTTP server to get the Documents from. The remote host can be configured in the livingdoc.yml config section of the repository. Use baseURL to set the base url of the remote host that hosts the Documents. As default the server on port 80 on the localhost is used as REST Repository.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RESTRepository

                      java.lang.String name,
                      @NotNull
                      RESTRepositoryConfig config,
                      @NotNull
                      io.ktor.client.HttpClient client)

        This implementation of a DocumentRepository uses a remote HTTP server to get the Documents from. The remote host can be configured in the livingdoc.yml config section of the repository. Use baseURL to set the base url of the remote host that hosts the Documents. As default the server on port 80 on the localhost is used as REST Repository.
